column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////As the JINYA Ramen website says: "Anyone from Japan can tell you: Real Japanese ramen isn't about the noodles
column2: it's about the broth."   Since JINYA opened up
column4: we have been looking to sample their broths and see if LA really has come to Houston. However
column5: with three kids under the age of 5 and a busy life
column6: we are never in the Midtown area (yes we need to get out more).  Thankfully
column7: after a couple hours at Children's Museum
column8: we were craving JINYA and it was only 9 minutes away.
